org.joml

Class Sphered

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joml.Sphered
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable

    public class Sphered
extends Object
implements Externalizable
    Represents a 3D sphere.
    Author:
    Kai Burjack
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double r
      The sphere's radius.
      double x
      The x coordinate of the sphere's center.
      double y
      The y coordinate of the sphere's center.
      double z
      The z coordinate of the sphere's center.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sphered()
      Create a new Sphered with center position (0, 0, 0) and radius = 0.
      Sphered(double x, double y, double z, double r)
      Create a new Sphered with center position (x, y, z) and radius r.
      Sphered(Sphered source)
      Create a new Sphered as a copy of the given source.
      Sphered(Vector3dc c, double r)
      Create a new Sphered with center position c and radius r.
      Sphered(Vector3fc c, double r)
      Create a new Sphered with center position c and radius r.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Return a string representation of this sphere.

        This method creates a new DecimalFormat on every invocation with the format string "0.000E0;-".

        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string representation
